english.segment1: A hand to hold. Is often hard to see. And I cannot. Deny You're reaching out to me. The day is gone. And still I know You're near. And I've got nothing to fear
english.segment2: CHORUS. But when I open my eyes. You're the first thing I see. A vision once clouded. I feel Your presence over me. From when the sun comes up. 'Til I fall asleep at night. I know You'll be there. When I open my eyes
english.segment3: Now granted.. I've been here a time or two. I've learned, I've lived. And now I've learned again. I pray that I.. I might become like You. I've got nothing to lose
english.segment5: Your love is like the ocean. It never stops rolling in. You are my world. I can't survive without You. With You it's all surrender. In that I find such peace. Tell me this is no dream, yah..
english.segment6: When I open my eyes. Oh Lord, I feel Your presence over me. From when the sun comes up. 'Til I fall asleep at night. I know You'll be there. I know that You'll be there..
